trainFile = train/FB2M.tsv
serializeTo = FB2M_text.ser.gz
map = word=0,answer=1

saveFeatureIndexToDisk = true

useClassFeature=true
useWord=true
useNGrams=true
noMidNGrams=true
maxNGramLeng=2
usePrev=true
useNext=true
useSequences=true
usePrevSequences=true
maxLeft=1
useTypeSeqs=true
useTypeSeqs2=true
useTypeySequences=true
wordShape=chris2useLC
useDisjunctive=true
qnSize=2
printFeatures=true
useObservedSequencesOnly=true
